thread.title: 22 '00s Emo Trends That Really Need To Come Back In 2017
thread.title_full: 22 '00s Emo Trends That Really Need To Come Back In 2017

author: Jasmin Nahar
title: 22 '00s Emo Trends That Really Need To Come Back In 2017
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @KidzBopH8r666 ID: 10305405 2. Straightening your hair to within an inch of its life. View this image ›
Twitter: @moodtbrl ID: 10305411 3. Having your fringe cover at least one eye. Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed
Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed
 ID: 10310960 4. Dyeing a chunk of your emo fringe a different colour. View this image ›
Paul Hawthorne / Getty Images ID: 10305395 5. Writing messages or band names on your hands. View this image ›
Twitter: @penhoIder ID: 10305464 6. Wearing studded belts, most likely more than one at a time. View this image ›
Twitter: @margera_curse ID: 10305400 7. Listening to your emo music out loud on your phone. View this image ›
Creative Commons / Flickr: mereteveian ID: 10305402 8. Posting emotional lyrics as Facebook statuses. View this image ›
Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed ID: 10305404 9. Wearing a shit-ton of black eyeliner. https://livinglik3kings.tumblr.com/post/110398393542/thereschemicalskeepingustogether-emo-holy-trinity View this embed ›
ID: 10305415 10. Or red eyeliner. View this image ›
Matthew Simmons / Getty Images ID: 10305544 11. Wearing a tie with everything. View this image ›
Claire’s / claires.co.uk ID: 10305416 12. Changing your name online to something more emo. View this image ›
Jasmin Nahar / BuzzFeed / Twitter ID: 10305421 13. Using these comics to express your feelings. View this image ›
Jeff Thomas / ponandzi.com ID: 10305444 14. Wearing shag bands even if you weren’t 100% sure what they meant. View this image ›
Twitter: @khairamcglashan It was all quite confusing but you were obsessed with breaking them anyway.
ID: 10305457 15. Wearing clothes with ribcages on them. View this image ›
Iron Fist clothing / ironfist.co.uk ID: 10305479 16. Taking all your selfies this way so that they were mostly showing the top of your head. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10305494 17. Owning everything that was to do with The Nightmare Before Christmas . View this image ›
Twitter: @sinsofknowing ID: 10305509 18. Making “free hugs” signs when going to a concert. View this image ›
Flickr: elisfanclub ID: 10305516 19. Wearing wallet chains. View this image ›
Creative Commons / Flickr: cutey5 ID: 10305540 20. Putting these badges on everything. View this image ›
Twitter: @_b0rnf0rthis ID: 10310612 21. Typing “liek thiiss View this image ›
Twitter: @yojihito ID: 10311465 22. And of course, arm warmers. View this image ›
Twitter: @GrannyChic_ Safety pins, stripes and lace, was the most emo combination.
ID: 10305440
Jasmin Nahar is a junior staff writer at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
